name: Eradicating PSN Command and Control Positions
description: Systematically dismantling the leadership and operational networks of PSNs by removing their key figures from power.

cards.title: Mapping PSN Power Structures
cards.description: Identifying and exposing the hierarchy and command nodes within PSN-controlled organizations.
bulletpoints: Using OSINT to track key decision-makers and their interconnections.
Identifying weak points in their hierarchical control systems.
Tracing financial and logistical dependencies to disrupt operations.

cards.title: Undermining PSN Leadership Legitimacy
cards.description: Utilizing legal, social, and financial strategies to remove credibility from PSN leaders.
bulletpoints: Exposing criminal activity through legal and investigative frameworks.
Using media narratives to erode public trust in PSN authority figures.
Engineering leadership fractures through controlled disinformation.

cards.title: Strategic Isolation of PSN Commanders
cards.description: Preventing key PSN figures from coordinating their networks by isolating them socially and economically.
bulletpoints: Cutting off digital and physical communication channels.
Denying PSN leaders access to their financial and operational assets.
Forcing leadership replacements that disrupt internal cohesion.
